Package modele.database

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • modele.database.Database
  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    Database class which communicate with the mysql/mariadb database It use JDBC to interact with the database It has two connections, one for read access and one for write access if the user has the rights
    Author:
    Groupe 4B2
